title: Hornets' Kidd-Gilchrist has dislocated right shoulder
text:
Published By: Fox News: Sports - Today 
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) Charlotte Hornets forward Michael Kidd-Gilchrist has a dislocated right shoulder....
